# About

This Bookdown is a guide to preserving public health data (or any at-risk data for that matter), from planning to storage and dissemination. To navigate, click on the headings in the table of contents at the left.

The source R Markdown files used to generate this guide are available at <https://github.com/preserve-public-health-data/guide>.

Scripts and example code beyond those presented in this guide are available at <https://github.com/preserve-public-health-data/code>.
